revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 62:;Leontas, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Kastorous, drachmas 8 copper drachmas 4;;Harpalos, son of Apion, grandson of Harpalos, mother Valeria, drachmas 8 copper drachmas 4;;Marcus Valerius Julianus (Julianus (Poupin));;(in left margin: obols 28) naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachmas 2 obols 5 chalki 2, surcharge obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3 obol 1.5;;Thermouthis, daughter of Sambas (wife of Apolinarios, worker on irrigation machines;;(in left margin: drachmas 68 obols 15)orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 14 obol 0.5, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 2, naubion drachma 1 obols 2.5, surcharges drachmas 3 obols 3;;eparourion drachmas 9 obols 2.5, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, kollybos obols 3 chalki 2, in total drachmas 31 obols 4.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 15 obol 1 chalki 2, surcharges drachmas 2 obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 37 obols 2.5;;Taonnophris, daughter of Horion through the agency of Tasoucharion, wife of Mikallos;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 17 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 2 obols 2.5 chalki 2, naubion drachma 1 obols 4.5, surcharges drachmas 4 obols 2 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 40)eparourion drachmas 11 obols 4, surcharges drachma 1, kollybos obols 4, in total drachmas 39 obols 2.5;;Petesouchos, son of Hatres, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Kastor, son of Apion (Apitas, son of Kothon);;(in left margin: obols 28) geometria for the 12th year drachmas 3 obol 1, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2;;Sempronia Petronia (Skiphas);;(in left margin: drachmas 48 obols 26) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 10, tax on the produce of olives drachmas drachma 1 obols 2.5, naubion drachma 1, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 3;;eparourion drachmas 6 obols 4, surcharges obols 3.5, kollybos obols 2 chalki 2, in total drachmas 22 obols 2 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 25, surcharges drachma 1 obols 3.5, in total drachmas 26 obols 3.5;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachma 1 obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachmas drachma 1 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;Pasion, son of Sambas, grandson of Phaesis, mother Aphrodite, drachmas 8;;Heras, son of Petheus;;donkey tax for the 13th year, instalment from the 11h year drachmas 5, surcharges obols 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 2;;Psenesis, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Psenesis, mother Heras, drachmas 8;;Hatres, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 464 obols 27;;(Pachon) 14 likewise:;Sisois, son of Karanos, grandson of Heraklas, mother Artemis, drachmas 40;;Lucius Antonius Gemellus (Gemella Tapeeis);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 8 obols 2.5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obol 1, naubion obols 5, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 0.5;;(in left margin: drachmas 136 obols 6) eparourion drachmas 5 obols 5.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2.5 chalki 2, kollybos obols 2, in total drachmas 18 obols 5.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 21 obol 1, surcharges drachma 1 obols 2 chalki 2, in total drachmas 22 obols 3 chalki 2;;and Tapeis, daughter of Ptolemaios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 237);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 3 obols 3.5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 3 chalki 2, naubion obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 5.5;;eparourion drachmas 2 obols 2.5, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 8 obol 1.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 9 obols 0.5, surcharges obols 4, in total drachmas 9 obols 4.5;;and Kapiton alias Antonius;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 15, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 2 obol 0.5 chalki 2, naubion drachma 1 obols 3, surcharges drachmas 3 obols 4.5;;eparourion drachmas 10, surcharges obols 5, kollybos obols 3.5, in total drachmas 33 obols 4.5 chalki 2.";;;
